 == Doctype ==

The doctype for the output XML is as follows:

{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>

 <!ELEMENT directory (directory|file)*>
 <!ATTLIST directory
    name         CDATA #REQUIRED
    lastModified CDATA #REQUIRED
    date         CDATA #REQUIRED
    size         CDATA #REQUIRED
    absolutePath CDATA #REQUIRED
    sort 		 CDATA #IMPLIED
    reverse		 CDATA #IMPLIED>
 <!ELEMENT file EMPTY>
 <!ATTLIST file
    name         CDATA #REQUIRED
    lastModified CDATA #REQUIRED
    date         CDATA #REQUIRED
    size         CDATA #REQUIRED
    absolutePath CDATA #REQUIRED>
}}}
